title: Bob Iverson
text: Robert Iverson (17 October 1910 – 19 July 1953) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> best known for his time at <a href="Aston%20Villa%20F.C.">Aston Villa</a>. Iverson signed for Villa from <a href="Wolverhampton%20Wanderers%20F.C.">Wolves</a>. After his Villa career he retired and became reserve/youth-team coach at <a href="Villa%20Park">Villa Park</a>. He was later first team coach and fourth team coach.
